concept.title: SMC PGI 5304.402 General

conbody.p: Obtain coordination from the Office of Public Affairs (SMC/PA) before giving the written approval in DFARS 252.204-7000, Disclosure of Information. SMC/PA requires use of the Public Affairs Security and Policy Review Worksheet .
